root.name: World War II: Panzer Claws
root.description: System requirements:OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU with 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: with DirectX support and 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Hard Drive: 1250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
